title: Insane Ping Spikes After Patch 7.2
body: After patch 7.2 dropped last night when minions get to lane my ping skyrockets to 2000+ ping all game and is outright insane. I've been reading around and multiple people are experiencing this issue after 7.2 was released last night. I've tried everything I can like everyone else has and none of it has helped. Please Riot fix this.

replies.body: Issues like this or sudden lag spikes are usually network problems to the game server, so you might be experiencing problems like packet loss.  There could be something going on as well but I could use some more information to investigate further.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of these ping spikes, and let me know the results.

Your average ping was 426 milliseconds.

The worst ping you experienced was 2688ms. This means you experienced high ping during this game, which is likely where you were seeing issues. See below for a few recommendations to help out with this.

Your average percentage of packet loss for this game was 2.39%.

Overall, this means you had a high amount of packets lost during the game. This can be caused by various network issues, so please see below for a few common steps that can help reduce packet loss.

Holy shit, are you playing from the moon?  That ping is crazy high and I feel your pain, though, it really does seem to be an issue of how your network is reaching our game servers.  When you have some time, go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  Make sure to go over every step and run a test in a custom game.  Let me know the results, because we really need to get that fixed.

And this is the log for the custom game I just played..


Your average ping was 49 milliseconds, which means your ping was good overall.

The worst ping you experienced was 55ms. This indicates your connection was stable for this game.

You had minimal packet loss during this game, meaning you had a very stable connection.
I'm assuming the guide was a success, because things look a lot better.  Is everything okay now?
No, everything is only fine in custom games, any games with actual players is when the ping and packet loss occur.

That's really strange, and I appreciate you trying that out.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a closer look and help individually.  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well to grab some logs to attach to your ticket.  We'll reply back asap!

il say its really not that strange at all. its in almost every lag forum pertaining to league of legends. i personally have put in 4 tickets. it seems to hit me and literally every single friend i have on league (about a 100 people) after every single patch and lasts for a few weeks. custom games are perfectly fine. as soon as you connect to real games its instant packet loss and huge ping spikes. BTW your support system has just given me the same steps over and over which have literally never worked :)
Sent.

This is me in a custom game ping is fine
https://gyazo.com/7204ddd6323906a701d4b88d17afa60c

Lol made me laugh! :) 
That's the thing, I jumped right into a custom game after that and my ping was perfectly fine sitting at my normal ping of 49-55.

Same. Ive been suffering from similar ping most of this year. Cannot find a fix that works. Lately I've been getting disconnected in the middle of games, sometimes several times a game. Makes ranking literally impossible.

So far my record spike (I kid you not) was 28k. And my resting ping hovers between 100-380ms on the low end and 400-800ms on the high end. Those numbers just jump around constantly.

Rip the good old days where I had a stable ping of 60.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=MG3HEYlO,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-01-26T19:19:26.028+0000)
>
> Issues like this or sudden lag spikes are usually network problems to the game server, so you might be experiencing problems like packet loss.  There could be something going on as well but I could use some more information to investigate further.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of these ping spikes, and let me know the results.

Just had a game where me and two other people on my team got disconnected and had ping spikes of over 4k for the duration. It's not a network issue.
That's insane, I dont think it is either.

i Hate when my ping sky rockets to 22 i drop frames so hard and the game is so unplayable at 22 ping. SMH
{{champion:32}}

The issue we're encountering doesn't happen during bot games or playing with AI or anything, I've played a few bot games with absolutely zero connection issues. These ping spikes that we're getting that exceed 2k+ only occur in games with other players, especially during team fights.
Same here, hopefully something can be fixed soon.

It's really important to go through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide as a first step to help rule out any local possibilities trying to reach the game server.  Your situation does sound strange so if it's still occurring after those steps then hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

Grab some logs from our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to provide some context, and our tech team will respond back as soon as possible.

Yeah I've been getting the same thing, it seems to get worst when in team fights.  I'm hardwired into my router and it still seems to be happening.  I'm going to replace my router tomorrow and see if it changes anything.  I see entire fights happen before my eyes at regular speed and I can't move at all.  It's very frustrating {{item:3073}}
Sounds exactly like my issues
I have the same issue as well. It's entirely dependent for me on whether or not I'm near player-champions.
Same! I've been looking for answers, I've been getting frustrated because I'm literally 5 feet from my router and I pay for the best internet service :((
I am also having these ping spikes! please fix this issue
Same here
Same for me

I read the whole thread to see if there were any solutions, but i dont see any...I have the same issue-
I can play like 2, 3 games that have average 29 to 32 ping, but then theres that game where i get a ping spike to 6k ping, 2k ping, 400- and it just bounces around like that. I get disconnected, etc. It's really annoying, especially if you're in ranked (which consequently loses you the match).
I've tried lag programs like Haste, i know i have good internet, but it still happens..

Me too, all my friends and players i meet in my games expirienced the same thing but it happened only once! It seems that what me and my friends expirienced happened to us only once - login issue, allthough i have connection it says that i cant connect to lol news in client and client acts as if i had super low connection and games pvp are unplayable but it happened only few times to my friends and only once to me....well...twice.

Same here i usually have decent ping but lately it seemed more laggy than usual i will be at 66 ping but its sky rockets to 500 and goes back down constantly league had become unplayable and some of my friends are experiencing this issue as well
my ping always used to be 35 now its 45 and i dont know what is causing it my internet works just fine
same here i cant play rank anymore or even normals i lost my points cuz of lag :( one game may be good next one is like 3k ms alll the game  ffs

I have the same issue..it was never like this before 
I'd go into game  and have  41 ping which is my normal 
then I'd randomly get 200
then back to 41 
then I'd go up to 3k ping 
and the down to 600 
then 41

and that happens throughout the whole damn game

> [{quoted}](name=Nîrayaa,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=MG3HEYlO,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2017-02-11T10:53:32.362+0000)
>
> I have the same issue..it was never like this before 
> I'd go into game  and have  41 ping which is my normal 
> then I'd randomly get 200
> then back to 41 
> then I'd go up to 3k ping 
> and the down to 600 
> then 41
> 
> and that happens throughout the whole damn game

Same here.

It is becoming unplayable at this point with the new client. I lag randomly ppl don't wait and cause me to have a 20 min wait time don't know how many times that has happened maybe 50 times. I'm so sick of it and I don't know what to do like I don't even. Know anymore. Loading in takes so long as well really what should I do. My lag goes up to 200000
Same issue here, was fine before most recent patch but i now get random spikes of up to 5k ping especially during team fights.

I'm experiencing this issue as well for the past 2-3 days now. I actually looked at the boards just to see if I'm not the only one. Just got out of a game where 3 of us were experiencing 2000+ ping. And games before that the maximum I got was 4000+ ping! Pla fix this issue.

same goes for me I didn't play too much lately but there are crazy latency spikes in my last couple of games. My internet connect seems to be fine at the same time. What is going on riot ? (using Mac client)

This is what's happening with me too. My ping reaches 4k+, but only once minion waves start. The game goes on around me like normal, but I either stand still, or skip in place (slide back and forth, kind of thing) right up until the greyscale of death happens.

i live an hour from the servers and get a constant 23ms but after this patch i have not been able to get into a game and stay in a game from lagging out of the game. When i play i dont have the highest ping issues, but i cant move or cs and there should be no reason for a people to have to go through that to play a game of{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}  League of Legends

Same issue.. only when player vs player fighting is happening on my screen

edit: disabling all sound seems to fix it for some reason
